#include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#define in cin
#define out cout
using namespace std;
const int MOD = int(1e9)+7;
struct mat{
    int m[6][6];
    mat(int p){
        for(int i=1;i<=5;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=5;j++){
            m[i][j]=0;
            if(i==j) m[i][j]=1;
            if(p==2 && i<j) m[i][j]=2;
        }
    }
    mat(){
        for(int i=1;i<=5;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=5;j++)
        m[i][j]=0;
    }
    mat operator * (mat &y){
        mat z;
        for(int i=1;i<=5;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=5;j++)
        for(int k=1;k<=5;k++)
        z.m[i][j]=(1LL*z.m[i][j] + 1LL*m[i][k]*y.m[k][j])%MOD;
        return z;
    }
};
mat pw(int b){
    mat p=mat(1),B=mat(2);
    for(int e=0;(1<<e)<=b;e++){
        if((1<<e)&b) p=p*B;
        B=B*B;
    }
    return p;
}
int main(){
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    ifstream in("test.in");
    ofstream out("test.out");
    #endif
    int n,k,m;
    in>>n>>k>>m;
    mat r=pw(n-1);
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=5;i++) ans=(ans+r.m[i][k])%MOD;
    ans=(1LL*ans*m)%MOD;
    out<<ans<<'\n';
    return 0;
}
